name: Drawerings - Mandala Kaleidoscope Drawings!
description:
Drawerings is a free, simple to use, and fun Kaleidoscope & Mandala Drawing Tool for all ages.

Create and color your own Kaleidoscope & Mandala drawings, quickly upload them to our online gallery, view, watch, share, like, & animate others' Drawerings; it's easy and fun! Explore and share over 150,000 Drawerings painted by our users!

With our Drawerings tool, everyone's an artist!


Check out www.drawerings.com for a web-based version of Drawerings.

.:. 2Dio is a two-man dev studio located in Seattle, Washington.
.:. Visit us at www.2Dio.com | @2DioStudio
